bibl.title: The Grand Mutation: Ptolemaic Bronze Currency in the Second Century B.C.
bibl.note: 1. The silver shortage. - 2. The great demonetization. - 3. The grand mutation. - 4. An interval of constricted monetary supply. - 5. Papyrological approaches tested against coin evidence.
